name: BitcoinMiner Idle Game
description:
Clicker - Idle Game made in Defold Engine

Farm Bitcoins to upgrade your set-up so you can farm more Bitcoins. 

Upgrade your computer up to five times for a faster click-production. Buy and upgrade items that will produce per second and see how far can you go without breaking the game!

This is a short game developed by two students during our first encounter with Defold Engine.

All assets are original. Sprites and animations made in Aseprite. Sound made in BeepBox.co & ProTools

Please share your thoughts in the comments or via Twitter @anaisenserio. We are still learning and all input will be well received ;)
